name: Core Bug -Prototype Demo
description:
(This is a prototye demo - everything you see is work in progress!)

Escape from an underground facility as a robotic bug in Core Bug, a top down shooter, where you are limited to a single projectile.

  • Link your projectiles movement your players, to maneuvered it around corners, through narrow hallways, or behind armored enemies. 
  • Complete an onslaught of challenges in story modes and race against to clock to complete every level as efficient as possible. 
  • Battle up to 3 other players in arena battles, by collecting power ups and outmaneuvering your enemies.

Controls

Supports keyboard and gamepad controlls

Movement: W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys or L-Stick- 
Shoot / Link ship to projectile: Spacebar or Spacebar or (B) - 
Dash (Multiplayer only): Alt or C or Del or M -
